# PHAssetResourceDataRequestID

**Type Alias**

A numeric identifier for an asynchronous asset resource loading request.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias PHAssetResourceDataRequestID = Int32
```

## Discussion

Pass this identifier to the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceManager/cancelDataRequest(_:)] method if you need to cancel a request before it completes.

## Constants

- **Resource Loading Request Identifiers**: Special values for the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceDataRequestID] identifier that are returned by asynchronous requests.
